definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]

sentences.english: Greek men were said to be a bit too soppy .
sentences.chinese: 希腊男人被认为有点“过于缠绵”。

sentences.english: The most interesting thing was to climb the Fragrant Mount.
sentences.chinese: 最有趣的事情莫过于爬香山了。

sentences.english: The Way of the Dragon God believes that the heart, more than anything else, points the way forward.
sentences.chinese: 龙神道相信指引方向的最大力量莫过于心。

sentences.english: Others said the plan was too big.
sentences.chinese: 还有的人说该计划过于宠大。

sentences.english: Widdowson ever criticized, "Structuralism focuses on language analysis and only reflects one aspect of communicative competence."
sentences.chinese: 而交际法有，过于恰恰相反注重语言在语境中的运用。

sentences.english: But don't over-intellectualize your emotional reaction. Instead, get out of your head and trust your instincts.
sentences.chinese: 不要不要对自己的情感过于理智，相信你的直觉。

sentences.english: On the whole it's a good plan and we shouldn't nitpick .
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，这个计划是好的，我们不应过于挑剔。

sentences.english: The style of the website, must have successional , cannot too too bouncing.
sentences.chinese: 网站的风格，一定要有连续性，不能太过于跳跃。

sentences.english: The new version emphasizes their looks and emotions too much, some say.
sentences.chinese: 有人认为新剧过于强调他们的外表和情感了。

sentences.english: Our elders exaggerate about love in college. They say love is a waste of time and money.
sentences.chinese: 我们长辈们总是过于夸张大学校园里的爱情。

sentences.english: For many young people their ego, or over-confidence, could be their Achilles' heel.
sentences.chinese: 年轻人的弱点也许是自负，过于的自信。

sentences.english: He had had enough of violence. Some of the people around today seemed to enjoy what they did far too much.
sentences.chinese: 但现在有些人似乎过于享受自己的暴力行动。

sentences.english: 'There was a period we became too profit oriented, ' he said. Mr.
sentences.chinese: 他说，曾有一段时间丰田变得过于以利润为导向。

sentences.english: However, the interface is slightly cluttered and the selection of hotels is limited.
sentences.chinese: 但是界面设计有点过于紧凑，酒店的选择也非常有限。

sentences.english: In sending twenty, they had been perhaps a little over-zealous.
sentences.chinese: 而他们往伦敦投送了20颗，表现得真是过于积极了。

sentences.english: However, he said the requirements should not be so strict for non-professional drivers.
sentences.chinese: 但他觉得对于非职业驾驶员要求不必过于严峻。
